title: MakeYourList
description: a user-friendly platform that empowers Spotify users to curate personalized playlists effortlessly. Users can handpick their favorite songs from their existing playlists and assemble them into new, custom playlists

title: Calculator
description: This Android application, provides users with a convenient calculator tool. Users can perform basic arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division by tapping on corresponding buttons

title: Backtracking Visualizer
description: an HTML-based web application designed to visualize the backtracking algorithm's application in solving Sudoku puzzles.

title: Taskboard
description: a web application for effortlessly managing tasks and keeping your to-do list organized This application is built with ReactJs and enhanced with react-toastify to provide an intuitive and efficient task management experience.

title: TestCasesGenerator
description: It's a tool for generating various types of test cases for programming and testing purposes. The tool provides three main functions: generating random strings, generating random arrays, and specifying test case parameters.

title: Cinestream
description: a web-based application built using the Streamlit library in Python. It offers the ability to search for top-rated movies and displays detailed information about the selected movie, including its poster, IMDb rating, and a clickable link to watch it.

title: recommend-anime
description: a web-based Anime Recommender System.It allows users to select their favorite anime from a list and then provides recommendations based on their choice.

title: pingpong
description: a classic game of Pong implemented in Python using the Turtle graphics library
